thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sporting Signs Up Player Lumor For 2.5 Mln Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sporting Signs Up Player Lumor For 2.5 Mln Euros
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - SPORTING CLUBE DE PORTUGAL FUTEBOL SAD (SPORTING):
* SAID ON WEDNESDAY REACHED DEAL WITH FUTEBOL SAD â€“ PORTIMONENSE TO TRANSFER PLAYER LUMOR FOR 2.5 MILLION EUROS
* SPORTING WILL HOLD 50 PERCENT OF ECONOMIC RIGHTS TO THE PLAYER WITH AN OPTION TO REACH UP TO 80 PERCENT
* LUMOR TO JOIN SPORTING FOR FOUR YEARS AND A HALF WITH A POSSIBLE EXTENSION OF ONE YEAR
Source text: bit.ly/2rTSUVb
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
